description: Love-lies-bleeding (Amaranthus caudatus) is an amazing plant species due to its striking appearance and versatility. Its bright red or burgundy flower clusters can be up to a foot long, cascading from the plant and making it into a visual masterpiece. Its applications make it a highly desirable ornamental plant, and its culinary and medicinal uses give it yet another layer of utility. On top of that, it is Hardy and low maintenance. Love-lies-bleeding is truly a magnificent species and a joy to have in any garden.
